website_summaries.verdict: Though there are some known issues that could be frustrating to deal with, it has many happy customers and attention-grabbing looks.
pros: Stands out for its attractive, bottom-loading design thanks to the stainless steel cabinet that conceals the water bottle
Produces hot, cold, and room temperature water
Nightlight tops its impressive feature set
cons: The cooling compressor has been known to have issues
Some difficulty removing the drip tray for cleaning

customer_reviews.title: It has worked great since then and the bottom loading feature is very ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my Avalon water cooler in November of 2016. It has worked great since then and the bottom loading feature is very convenient. A part that dispenses cold water broke inside the cooler a month ago. I contacted Avalon and after a few emails and me sending some pictures, they determined that the part was not something they could send me to replace. So they sent me an entirely brand new cooler. Their customer service is top notch, and this experience shows me that they stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Hausman

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this a one,
customer_reviews.text: This product stinks. When i first got it the buttons to dispense water (all three) pushed extremely hard. I kept it thinking it would get better and that the cause was due to it needing a break in period. Uhmmm. NO. The buttons never worked right and now the machine will not dispence water at all. The motor runs but it will not draw the water up into the unit for me to dispense. So now i have a $149.00 piece if junk sitting in my kitchen. I wanted to give no stars but you know the deal with that. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Scheri Y.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure they send the right one!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I came home to find an all black (I ordered stainless steel) water cooler in my Kitchen. My husband already had it set up so it was impossible to send it back. ***UPDATE*** Just a couple days after posting this Avalon contacted me and made everything right. The customer service is excellent. I would change my rating to at least 4 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Renaud

customer_reviews.title: Bad water pump.
customer_reviews.text: Least expensive part does not work. The small water pump only worked for a week, it no longer pumps water any more. The light always flashes to indicate the bottle is empty while the bottle is still half full.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nicely packaged no damage
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered today. Nicely packaged no damage. I am a single 53 year old woman. I had no problem figuring out how to operate it. It is nicely designed and sleek looking. It was a breeze to install the pump in the water bottle and get it going. It didn't even take 30 minutes to have nice cold water. I would recommend to anyone considering this purchase to get it. It's much nicer than any I could find in our local SAMs or Lowes. It runs very quietly . I love it! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KSJ

customer_reviews.title: Hot water dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Love this dispenser. Look, size, all except that I am wasting too much water, trying to get hot water without white specks. Its seems to go away after I poor out the water 4 times. Wasting too much water. I have gone through three 5 gallon jugs. Thought the specks would work there way out after a couple uses. They have not yet, and I am wasting to much delicious and expensive Mountain Valley Spring Water. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great water cooler and dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: I was getting tired of the taste of our tap water, so I decided to purchase this dispenser. It came already together. This works great. I like the fact that it is a bottom loader. The cold water is pretty cold and the hot water is pretty hot. It seems to be very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mack

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: This water cooler is excellent. Easy set up. Bottom loading water is convenient. It is quiet in all modes, I saw reviews that said it's noisy; that is not the case. Three temperatures is great. The nightlight is perfect for late night use. Lastly, delivery was prompt and as advertised. I recommend the product!
customer_reviews.author: mike h

customer_reviews.title: Hand Down Amazing and Affordable!!! Buy it Now
customer_reviews.text: I Loooooove my water dispenser so much! It's sleek, not bulky, no drips after the water comes out, and works Perfect!!! I recommend this to anybody!! I paid this with my OWN money and I am So happy with this purchase. You have to get this and I promise you won't be disappointed. It comes already put together, all you have to do it take it out the box, add the water at the bottom and that's it. It's not noisy at all and just perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Essence W.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!! Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Within the first week this dispenser stopped working completely. With not being able to return it, I called there customer service. That was a mistake on its own. Sir "try taking the plug out than plugging it back in". If I could give this zero stars I would in a heartbeat. Please what ever you do, don't waste your money and buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk with low quality materials
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for two weeks, left for 4th of july for a week to home to a kitchen floor covered in water. The pump on the cooler continues to run until water spills out of the tank. After diagnosing the problem the hose to the room temp button came loose and is too small to reinsert. All in all just cheap materials used..... should have gotten a 50 dollar top load...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Looks gorgeous and fantastic customer support!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I received a cooler that was defective. After calling amazon, they contacted the distributor who reached out to me within 24 hours to rectify the problem. I received a new unit within 48 hours. Absolute pleasure to deal with customer service and the unit looks gorgeous in my kitchen as it matches my stainless steel appliances, win win!
customer_reviews.author: joshua harel

customer_reviews.title: Defective from day 1
customer_reviews.text: Defective- sucked up half of a 5 gallon canister of water and immediately poured it out onto the floor through the center of the machine. There must be broken lines coming from the pump
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I have order two of these water dispensers and both came with a defective warm water dispensing button. I have to mash the button so hard to dispense the water, it's difficult to hold it long enough to get a full glass of water. The price seems great, but beware and don't buy this dispenser. Boxing this dispenser back up to return it, is no picnic either. Pay more money and avoid the aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Sue's Review

customer_reviews.title: they honor their warranty, even shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler, except cooling broke after about 6 months. However I contacted the company and they even sent me a big box to ship it back in then a new unit which worked perfectly. So this gets 5 stars from me because I am impressed, it is rare to find companies that still have warranties that are worth anything. I was afraid it would be the typical " pay for all shipping back and forth" which would end costing more than the cooler probably but they didn't even try to pull any BS. They seem like an honorable small american company, gets respect from me. I already recommended to a friend looking for a cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Waffle Lover

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Domt waste your time, DO NOT BUY THIS WATER DISPENSER. QUALITY CONTROL IS HORRENDOUS. They sent me this product twice and both times they were defective. Paying 200 bucks for junk. Thanks for flooding my carpet and wasting my time. Would put negative stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser was difficult from the beginning and I regret not returning it within the first 30 days. The reviews were mixed and I chose to listen to the good reviews instead of the bad. Lesson learned because I was warned. I wasted my money and will now have to buy a new dispenser. Whenever I put in a new bottle of water it took an inordinate number of tries to get the hose just right, or else the water would not dispense. Sometimes as many as 17 tries. Yesterday, nothing worked. We have tried since last night and all day today with no luck. I am officially done fighting with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Sofiesmom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as advertised - don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: update: total waste of money. This machine won't even suck up the water. Stopped working altogether after a few months. Infuriating! DO NOT buy this piece of crap. Original post upon receipt: Well, I took a gamble on this....& lost! It was expensive but I needed a water cooler with a room temperature option. This NEVER work. Both room temp & cold are exactly the same. The hot barely works. Very disappointed. It looks nice and that's about it. Too bad it's too much hassle to return such a heavy, bulky item. The buttons are also hard to push down & the cheap, plastic tray under the dispenser taps looks tacky.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: On second thought
customer_reviews.text: i originally wrote a bad review because the one I bought had a faulty sensor. But the company jumped on it with a replacement. And now, a year later I want to switch it to a rave. Not only was the customer service excellent, but I’m really enjoying its performance — and the fact that I don’t have to wait/plan for a strong man to hoist a bottle! I can change this one myself!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Savage

customer_reviews.title: No cold water
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst Amazon purchase experience I've had. I really hope Amazon or Avalon will fix this problem. Out of the box the cold water didn't work. I contacted both Amazon and Avalon immediately and they said I would have to re-package and take to a local warehouse/receiving location. I have been ordering from Amazon Prime for close to 10 years now and I have never been sent through so many hoops. I just want them to come pick it up and give me my money back at this point. If you get one that works, great, but if you need to return it, good luck!
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: There was only one little hiccup. I had one water cooler delivered. It was damaged in the box. The return was handled promptly. I love this. I read a review prior to purchasing where someone commented that it was noisy. It only makes noise when it is dispensing. I can live with that! I love the three options of hot, room temp and cold water. The night light is a nice touch. For the price, it still has a nice design. And, no lifting five gallon water bottles! My goal was to drink more water. (Live in AZ, it is a job!) When you can stop messing with refrigerating water, it gets much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Holmberg

customer_reviews.title: So Bummed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this water cooler and had it shipped directly to my son at college. So disappointing because the cold water doesn’t work (I bought it for the cold water since he goes to school in AZ), the buttons are really hard to push, its very slow and it was the wrong color. There’s no way to return it now that it’s put together and the 4 five gallon full water bottles I bought for it are sitting there not being used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SHOULD BE 0 STARS
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS MACHINE LITTLE OVER 6 MONTHS AGO AND SPENT OVER $200, AND NOW IT DOESN'T WORK AT ALL !! AND I AM NOT ALLOWED TO RETURN IT? NOR CAN I FIND ANY PARTS TO FIX IT. LOOKS LIKE A WATER PUMP ISSUE ANOTHER CUSTOMER HAD. DON'T WAIST YOUR MONEY ON AMAZON, GO TO COSTCO WHO RETURNS ANYTHING NO MATTER HOW MUCH TIME.
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Gross water, impossible to clean, terrible investment
customer_reviews.text: After a few months, the water became contaminated once filtered through the machine and its impossible to clean. Called for help and coulden't get though. Poor customer support. This is going to be trashed.This is only good for a few months before it goes bad. Its impossible to clean yourself and I'm not going to waste my time trying trying to figure out who to call to clean it, nor do I even want a third party in my house for that. This is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Delpheus

customer_reviews.title: Died At 1 Year and 1 week
customer_reviews.text: At first I really liked this cooler. Then the room temp water slowed to a trickle and soon after the pump just quit working. I liked the idea of the more compact size, but I think gravity feed will be the way to go. Last I checked, Gravity does not fail.
customer_reviews.author: Choppahead

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 45 days
customer_reviews.text: Worked great when it worked for a month and a half now makes a terribly loud sound and smells like burning
customer_reviews.author: ModestMarill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set-up--- looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set-up--- looks nice, very stable, EZ to load, I was a little hesitant cause some folks said it was a bit noisy. You can hear it work as it sucks water from the bottle underneath, but it is not at all loud. The refrigeration unit is very quiet as well. I like the fact you can turn off the heater--I myself, don't need the hot water side. It has a room temperature selection which is kinda neat, We use that more than I would have thought. Has a nice little night lite, so you can find your way to the water at night...pretty neat as well
customer_reviews.author: T. Gloersen

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong like new after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Still going strong like new after 1 year. "You purchased this item on August 18, 2016. " It is 10/24/2017
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Cold water! But VERY loud
customer_reviews.text: Update 1/7/2019: I've had this for a few months now and I'm very disappointed how loud this can be! It seems to be in "cleaning mode" most of the day and night. I've been sitting here from 8am to 12:09pm and the sound has been like this non stop! See video. Only rating this a 3 because of how loud it is. Very sleek design. Looks great. Just started using this and the water flow isn't as fast as other dispensers. But the water is really cold! Update: had this for a few weeks now. Water is ice cold! The flow of the water is actually faster now. And then it’s in “self cleaning” mode, it gets really loud.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Tenorio

customer_reviews.title: Buttons hard to push and water dispenses slow!
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited to receive this item only to be disappointed. I should have paid attention to the reviews. The buttons are VERY hard to push and the water dispenses VERY slow! The cold only works sometimes! I’m going to return and try the whirlpool.
customer_reviews.author: A Michele

customer_reviews.title: REVISED REVIEW—issue resolved
customer_reviews.text: The problem I had previously described below is easily resolved. Just call an outstanding support rep named Angel at 1-800-256-0695 and you’ll be fixed in two minutes. Great unit. Thanks, Angel! ——————- The water stream, due to its feeble pump lifting water up as opposed to gravity-fed, is WAY too slow. It takes 30 seconds to fill a 12-ounce bottle. Its second failure is the top-mounted buttons are ridiculously hard to push down—and then HOLD DOWN down while you wait for its dribbling streamlet to fill your cup. If you’re a female or over 60, these mash-down dispensing buttons may render the unit unusable. Go with bottle-top gravity-fed and let physics, not a whining little pump, do the work.
customer_reviews.author: Tbonicus

customer_reviews.title: This is a price of junk doesn’t work garbage
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this unit ... never worked correctly absolute price of garbage. I have had this for maybe a year and every time I want water I need to pen the door and close it to activate the motor to suck up water. The room temp water never ever worked and the hot only works once and a while if I open and close the door a few times wait for the motors to suck up some water then when it shuts off so it again at a min of three times. Just ordered a different unit totally different brand for 213 bucks and this one is going out in tomorrow trash run!
customer_reviews.author: Db133

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product-don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this item for 10 months and have had nonstop issues. My husband has been able to fix most of them but today it officially stopped working. Buttons were hard to press in, pump stopped working sporadically, water flow is slow and occasionally leaks. Frustrating to invest $250 in a water machine and it lasted 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle McHargue

customer_reviews.title: Bad Merchandise and Terible AMAZON customer service.
customer_reviews.text: It only works for 3 months and it does not dispense water at all now. Call for service no help. Contact AMAZON for help several times no results. Amazon customer service repesentative never call back even they got your number and promise to call back. Bad Merchandise and Terible AMAZON customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. ITS A JUNK.
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this product. It came broken. It leaks water. Horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Turk Basar

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service & product
customer_reviews.text: Our unit worked well but at one point it began to show sediment flakes in our water. The customer support helped us understand how to better clean the machine. Unfortunately, that did not work...so they replaced the unit with a new one. The new one has a steel uptake straw so I believe that may be the difference maker since the other one was plastic. They even sent a follow-up email several weeks later to see if everything was going alright. Superior customer service. I would recommend to them that they somehow work in a switch that doesn't fill the hot or cold water tanks if they are not being used.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B Colagross

customer_reviews.title: THE WORST - horrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost the water coolers buttons do not work. There is not enough pressure when the water comes out; it's more of a trickle than anything else and that is with pushing the button as hard as I can - however, not too hard because otherwise it gets stuck down and I have to hit the top of the machine to release it after my floor is a massive puddle. The water is also not cold even though the cold button is being pressed and the water cooler has been plugged in since I got it (and yes I remembered to turn the cold water switch on in the back). WHAT A WASTE OF $200.00.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: This water dispenser is discrete, looks great in our kitchen, and was easy to set up. The bottom loading is super great (not having to hoist and flip the 5 gallon drums is perfect), and it runs quietly. The night light feature is nice as well. The 3 dispensing buttons on the top of the machine are a little "clunky" looking and bigger than expected (I actually thought the front panel with the symbols was where the buttons for use were), but for the price and quality that's not world ending. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hassler's

customer_reviews.title: Bad tasting water after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: this water dispenser was good until 3 months. Then water started tasting funny. I contacted company and they refused to take machine back even under 1 year warranty. They told me to fix it myself and they would send some tools and pieces. I refused. Do not buy from AVALON. You will be stuck with machine and no money back or replacements. Terrible customer service and they take your money and run and you are stuck with defective machine.
customer_reviews.author: wa254

customer_reviews.title: Loud, sticky buttons, slow
customer_reviews.text: Filling up the water in the tank causes a slow but loud whir noise. The flow of the water is very slow. You need to press the button harder than normal to dispense (thumbs and palm pressure). If you push down the wrong way and the button can also get stuck. We learned the hard way by the water button getting stuck and overfilling. Do not recommend. It looks nice with the hidden bottle and clean colors. I wouldn’t recommend it for functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Y

customer_reviews.title: Love this dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser is as it describes. It was up and running minutes out of the box. Easy to load the 5 gal bottles on the bottom. No need for heavy lifting anymore. The hot water is perfectly hot. The cold water is super cold. Room temp is room temp! I'm not sure of the noise others described. I don't find there is any noise at all. Like some refrigerators there is metal cage on the back. Maybe they are placing this too close to the wall and it is vibrating?? Not sure. I have mine 1/2" from the wall and it is silent.
customer_reviews.author: D.Brittain

customer_reviews.title: Water Cooler is Great
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a water cooler for a few months and bought this one . I read all the Reviews and found it was a pretty good cooler . It was boxed right , unpacked it , threw in the Water bottle and fired it up . With in a hour I had cold water . It's really easy to change out water bottles And it accepts both sizes , 3 or 5 gallon . Also has kid protection for the hot water so they won't get Burnt , a major plus seeing how we have grand kids . You can't go wrong buying this water coller.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Felten

customer_reviews.title: Noisy after a month of use.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for about 6 weeks. Still works.....But noticed that recently when you dispense water the motor continues running for about 30 seconds after you stop. I can live with that.... but NOW it is making a really loud noise even when not dispensing . The noise isn't constant, but when it comes on its hard to ignore. Would return, but the return window is over..... Guess I am stuck with it. I mean the motor running is louder than any device I have ever had ... louder than my dishwasher when it is running..... a constant. BUZZZZZZZZZZZ. ugh. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Diane D. Gonsiorowski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Very nice water dispenser, I love how it’s bottom loading so no more back strain loading water jugs. Hot is very very hot so be careful and cold is ice cold. All the buttons for the dispensers are on the top so kids can’t reach and hot has a child safety latch on it.
customer_reviews.author: usmc85

customer_reviews.title: This is great...
customer_reviews.text: No more hoisting forty plus pound water bottles, no more getting splashed when the new bottle slams home. This cooler is wonderful; remove the blue cap from the bottle, push the dispenser cap down over the bottle opening, slide the bottle into the cabinet and close the door. We're getting up there in age and while we can efficiently handle the bottle changing on a conventional water cooler, there are probably reasons why we shouldn't; this water cooler totally takes away the effort of a water bottle change. It operates well, the cold water is cold, not cool, cold--but not freeze your teeth off cold. The hot water is hot, etc. In truth I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bogaty

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: We really love our new water cooler. We just re-designed our whole kitchen and renovated it. I had an older kind of funky water cooler pretty standard. I want something that fit the new look of our awesome new kitchen. With no bottle showing and having hot cold and room temperature it’s just perfect and very smart. If you’re contemplating this just take the leap of faith and go for it. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Mwsuss

customer_reviews.title: One of the best water coolers I've seen.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cooler in Jan 2019. It's got a nice sleek design to fit in any place. I like that you don't have to flip the 5 gallon bottle upside down and you can hide it. The added light is a plus for late night water trips. In addition, it lets your know when your water bottle is empty or low. We did have a problem with the signal not turning off and not getting any water. I contacted customer support through email and Jill R was able to direct me to a very simple fix that took no time. So it's great to know the company has great customer service as well!
customer_reviews.author: Brittni C.

customer_reviews.title: Other reviews stating pump not working may be missing a SIMPLE fix....
customer_reviews.text: We bought this two years ago and no problem until after we moved it in a remodeled kitchen and the water would not dispense up from the bottle. I was discouraged after reading several reviews citing pump failures. I could tell the motor was spinning, but no water was being pumped. Then I saw a YouTube video, and the problem was that the small diameter plastic hose feeding water into the pump was loose and the pump was just sucking air. A simple 2 second squeeze to set the tube end firmly into the pump and BINGO...water pumping.
customer_reviews.author: Papabri

customer_reviews.title: Consistently breaking down
customer_reviews.text: After replacing the first unit I received shortly after receiving it because the cold water tank kept freezing over, I returned home to a unit that when filling, pours water all over my floor. Obviously not a solid build or this wouldn't keep happening. I was hoping the first unit I received might have been faulty but here I am again spending more time troubleshooting an Avalon water cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay for a year, then suddenly the pump stopped working. Support at Avalon just offered the usual "tighten all the connections" solutions, but stopped responding after realizing it was something more difficult. Not only did the pump stop working, the cooling unit went out of control, freezing the water in the internal reservoir despite the refrigeration switch being turned off. Timing was perfect too. Started doing this just after one year, which is when the 1-year limited warranty expired. Don't think I would buy an Avalon product again.
customer_reviews.author: JF502

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: i love the product. The hot water makes a wonderful cup on tea on demand and the chilled water is perfect. the reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is the shipping. Instead of shipping via UPS (who delivers to the door) they shipped via USPS, so I had to drive into town, get them to load the heavy, bulky box and then call someone to come over and unload it and bring it into the house for me. I cannot for the life of me figure out why it was shipped this way.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly King De Loach

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the fact that there is little room for a container to ne filled. I would prefer a different way to replace the new 5 gallon water jug. I don't like having to fight with the door to get it open. Don't like how awkward it is to fill a glass. LOVE 3 temperature choices for water and how very quiet the machine runs. The night light is of no value other than to find the machine in total darkness. Actually read reviews on this before I purchased so bought extended warranty which I now believe (at this Point) was a waste of funds. Overall it is a nice looking machine and does what it says it wii do.
customer_reviews.author: oliver

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: Best investment for anyone who has a bad back. I got to the point I could no longer lift the heavy water bottles to the top load water dispenser. This has been a welcome change. I almost sent it back because when I first received it the buttons were hard to push. Followed troubleshooting instructions and I discovered an electrical cover had dislodged in transit. Took two seconds to reattach it and have had no issues since. I don't have a huge need for hot water so I have not hooked up that feature. I use bottled water for ice, tea and cooking. So nice not to strain my bulging compressed back discs anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hays

customer_reviews.title: customer service and the product is great!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this product is working great!! I cannot complain about it. I had an issue in the beginning because the water wasn't going into the filter but I called the number on the side of the machine and the lady walked me through the whole process on how to fix it! The customer service was amazing! Of course I'm no technician but if you have patience and listen carefully to the instructions then you can fix it. It avoided me the return process! Overall the product is great and I am super excited in using it! And save money on water bottles and save the planet 🙏🤗
customer_reviews.author: Jean Marie Medina

customer_reviews.title: I love it!  But, room temperature dispenser doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: No more lifting heavy 40 pound water bottles and twirling them upside down and then aiming to get them onto the water dispenser without an accident! Love the water sucking probe that fills the cold and heat channels. Just slide the water jug right side up into the bottom compartment and close. Looks like a mini fridge door. The probe sucks up the water for dispensing prior to needing water so there is no delay in dispensing water. I love it! Will never go to top dispenser again. Bottom dispensing is the way of the future!
customer_reviews.author: Lost in LA

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: If you order water from a service, buy or rent their dispenser. This one is cheap considering $150, but not worth it in the long run. Should have listened to the reviews I read before making the purchase however well water was not an option for me my animals to drink. Very loud, can’t continually fill without it slowing down even though bottle is full. I thought switching from a rented monthly unit would be better.... this is not worth the price better off renting a unit you can return that doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've had this water cooler for a few months now and overall have not had any problems with it. It's nice to have a bottom loading cooler that has room temp, hot, and cold water. All this for an affordable price too. I've tried quite a few other brands but find this one to be nearest to perfect. The only downsides I have found in using it are that it's a little on the noisy side when it's operating and the bottoms on the top of the machine for dispensing it(see third picture) are a little cheap feeling. Besides these two nuances, it does a great job and the pump works better than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: DSM

customer_reviews.title: Broke just at the one year mark
customer_reviews.text: The cooler was great for a year. I drink room temp water but others like the cold water feature so we settled on this one. Within a year the buttons to dispense went out, first the cold water, then the room temp option. I'd consider a different option.
customer_reviews.author: James Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful water dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water dispenser, the design is sleek and modern and goes with all our appliances. The water is delicious and cold, the hot water is one of the best features I make tea instantly all the time so I enjoy it very much. It is not noisy at all I'm not sure what others were mentioning, the first few minutes you initially insert your new 5 gallon water jug it makes a quiet hum just till the water enters the system. One of my favorite purchases I've made on Amazon, very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Biabell

customer_reviews.title: Not our first choice but not had.
customer_reviews.text: After having three Primo coolers we decided to try the Avalon. It does not allow you to dispense water by pressing the glass against the dispenser. You put the glass in the tray and press the top. Initially I thought it was very difficult to press but we moved to a new house and now it works much easier. Not sure why. Still takes two hands to get a drink of water. This is its biggest flaw. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS FOR ANYONE WITH HAND OR STRENGTH ISSUES.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald C.

customer_reviews.title: I give it an A-.....a good dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Alrighty.....I give this product an A-..... Good: cold water is COLD Bottom dispensing is awesome Sleek design Doesn’t run cooling cycle that much Not so good (but not terrible) Noise is a little noisier than my last one. Good news is that it’s not running that often. All dispensers have some noise so you need to expect some noise. Overall I’m a fan....the pros outweigh the cons on this one.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.text: Good modern design, nice colors, silver (stainless steel look door), shiny black all around. Easy to load 3 gallon or 5 gallon jugs. Great, easy instructions for set up. One star mark down because the suction pump that runs when dispensing is a little louder than I anticipated. The compressor that cools the water also a bit loud. Again, these noises are not obnoxious, but I expected a bit quieter. The compressor and the dispensing pump activate when operating the unit and the water dispenser remains quite when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: E.S.A.

customer_reviews.title: Died after 9 months - DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I should have known from the get go that there were going to be problems as after a few weeks of having it, it began rattling or buzzing a lot. We used tape at the base of the dispenser and that seemed to help. Then, we had to make sure the water was in just so with the tube going a certain way or it would flash red at us that it wasn't working properly. Now the pump has gone kaput. This thing is garbage!
customer_reviews.author: D. Rooke

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the cool, cold and hot water
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this high quality water dispenser. Totally quiet. With 3 option to deliver your water. Hot, cool, and cold. The hot water is hot enough to make hot cup of coffee, cool is just right, not too warm and not too cold, and the cold is just like if you had taken cold water out of your refrigerator. Very easy to take out the empty bottle and replace with a full one. You can't go wrong picking this water dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Special Edition

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I do this years ago?
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for it has eliminated so many small plastic water bottles from my trash and landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Petrus

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: When our old water cooler started leaking, I went in search of a new one. My favorite feature is that I no longer have to lift that heavy bottle of water and then have to tip it upside down on top of the cooler. I hated that! With this water cooler, you just slide it in to the bottom cabinet and insert the tube. Easy! The cold water comes out nicely chilled and the hot water is hot enough to brew a cup of tea. My only complaint is that I didn't notice the height of this unit. I wish it was just a couple of inches taller. Not a big deal and definitely not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: The Novel LadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pump failed twice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item and the pump failed before a year. I contacted Amazon, as I had purchased insurance. They refunded my money. I contacted Avalon and purchased a pump. I replaced the pump. Ran for 3 moths and pump went out again. I proceeded to purchase another pump from Avalon. This one only lasted 3 weeks. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Buttons are really hard to push down. My thumb hurts after getting a glass of water. This thing lasted for 3 months before it started leaking. I picked up my work bag which was sitting next to this dispenser and I noticed my bag was soaking wet. I unplugged the dispenser and moved it to find water damage to my side boards and a trail of water coming from this. Very poor quality and waste of money. This is similar to many other reviews. Don’t buy this and save yourself a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well
customer_reviews.text: I had nothing but problems with this dispenser. The plastic pipes dispensing the water would get crimped and nothing would dispense. The buttons dispensing the water would get stuck. The final straw was today when the dispenser leaked 1/2 of a 5 gallon water bottle all over the floor. I will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Noble

customer_reviews.title: Motor fails to work after couple months usage!!
customer_reviews.text: Dont’ buy this product. I bought it in Oct’18 and the motor that sends water to top compartment stopped working by end of Dec’18 making the whole unit useless!!! Since it’s been 3 months, return window on this product seems to have closed. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Great dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I waited so long to get one of these. I love that the gallon is hidden and I love having 3 different tempurature options. I'm not a big water drinker but the temp of the coldest water on this dispenser makes the water taste soo good. I actually enjoy drinking water when it's that temp. I also like that it is easy enough for my 4 year old to get his own water. I don't have to worry about him burning himself with the hot one. It has a lock he doesn't bother with.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Button got stuck and dumped water everywhere
customer_reviews.text: It was fun trying to wrestle the water jug out of the machine while it was dumping everywhere, in a suit, in front of clients. Eventually got the button to un-stick by hitting the machine repeatedly. I wouldn't have written a review, but I'm conveniently outside the return window (I bought this machine last fall) and couldn't find a way to contact Amazon directly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Really Love My Avalon Water Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Update: After visiting the Avalon website and doing some extensive reading, it DOES indicate that the "room temperature" water will be "cool"; So, as of now, absolutely no issues with my Avalon Water Cooler! ------- So far, I love my Avalon Water Cooler... However, my "room temperature" water dispenser is just as cold as my "cold" dispenser. This concerns me as I think the unit is erroneously and unnecessarily chilling water that should not be chilled or heated at all...
customer_reviews.author: SKaredyKat

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Came in one box, easy to assemble. It takes some time to let the water get cold. Only complaint the child safety lock they mention is a joke if you have a smart kid lol. It's a red button on top of unit you slide on and off. But the bottons for water are also ontop. So little hands wondering my figure out the switch. Loading the water is simple. So glad won't have to buy jugs of water constantly now
customer_reviews.author: gary clark jr

customer_reviews.title: Good Water Dispenser-Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I previously submitted a review praising the Avalon Water Dispenser. It has features I like e.g. the ease of connecting a new bottle, the red light indicating an empty bottle, enough room to fill a larger water bottle, and the ease of emptying the overfill tray. I want to add now that customer service is also very helpful. For no apparent reason the room temperature nozzle quit working. We called customer service, who emailed video instructions. When we still had a problem. customer service (Tyler) stuck with me as we emailed back and forth to get the problem fixed. It has been working fine since then.
customer_reviews.author: Deaconessa

customer_reviews.title: Everybody HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: Was little worried about the amount of 1 and 2 star reviews, but went ahead anyway. We are a small office but with a lot of water drinkers. Item came right on time, no issues with unpacking or being damaged. So far we are very very happy. And hot water is indeed: very HOT! We were little surprised however how small (as in low) it is.
customer_reviews.author: Tulip

customer_reviews.title: Hot Water is Hot. Cold Water is Cold.
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. The cooler is not silent but it is quiet. Bottom load is a huge plus because 5 gallon jugs are not easy to lift. The buttons work perfectly, no sticking and they are not hard to press. Lastly, the water taste amazing.....as it should. Oh, one more thing, the water flow is good - it’s not a trickle, a bit stronger than the typical water coolers at your workplace.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cooler, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Nice cooler. I looked at several before purchasing this one. After 7 months, the cooling unit stopped operating. I contacted Customer Support, which was awesome. After several checks over the phone, Avalon Customer Support shipped me a NEW replacement cooler within 5 days. Now that's service. Angel at Customer Support was professional and pleasant. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very classy and efficient water dispenser
customer_reviews.text: We love how easy it is to use and how nice it looks in the kitchen. The hot water is ready to make tea or instant coffee immediately and the cold water is nice and chilled. The 'cool' water is definitely on the cool side and not room temperature, which I wish it was as I give this water to our pets, but it's not that big of a deal. It's not as cold as the cold water, which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggybaby

customer_reviews.title: Item Defective
customer_reviews.text: I followed all the instructions and filled my water bottle and plugged the unit in. After 3 or 4 minutes, water started to pour out of the unit all over my kitchen floor. It appears something was not correctly installed in the upper part of the unit, allowing water to pour out. Not acceptable. This product is made in CHINA and the lack of quality shows! No more products from CHINA!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy, Until....
customer_reviews.text: Great unit, saved me from upgrading my fridge. Wish this one was self cleaning. Update: It was good until it hit the end of the bottle. Then it started tasting funny. Put in a new one and still funny. Went to clean it per the instructions....not worth the hassle. Returned it for a different model.
customer_reviews.author: T-CATT

customer_reviews.title: Cold water tastes DISGUSTING
customer_reviews.text: Hot and cool water taste fine but Cold water tastes disgusting- undrinkable - like plastic. We've tried running through a couple of gallons but it still is undrinkable. Of course we're 2 days past the return window :-( Soo... I'm going to reach out to the company for service and will update accordingly. Otherwise the machine looks great, is quiet to run.
customer_reviews.author: B. Swartwood

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cooler for almost a month and so far, there have been no problems. I find it to be very quiet compared to my previous coolers. The only minor complaint I have would be that it takes a bit longer to fill glasses than I am used too. Since it came with a 2 year warranty, I feel comfortable giving this a solid 4.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Will Knapik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler. Cold water is really cold and hot is really hot. Bought one for home and one for my business. Only complaint is that the room temp water spout is often colder than my husband would like because it’s affected by the temp of the cold water tank. I could care less bc I don’t drink room temp water, just the cold one and it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Dani MU

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This item is junk have had it for several months and the dispenser is not working properly. Everyone, listen when I tell you please don't buy this product it's a waste of your money
customer_reviews.author: Tclinksc

customer_reviews.title: lets meet at the water cooler
customer_reviews.text: Other than having to replace the water jugs because I am drinking so much water now its a great item! I have never drank so much water in my life and my energy level is up I feel great and I only wish I discovered this years ago. Do yourself a favor and buy one of these and get the water delivered weekly because it the best thing you can do for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Schatz

customer_reviews.title: Nice Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice machine. Everything works well with no issues. The only 2 things I don't care for is that the rod going into the water bottle is made of medal and is not flexible to help get out the last bit of water. The other thing is that it is louder than me last dispenser. There is a noticeable hum when you are in the same room but I would not say that it is "loud". Neither of these issues are biggies. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene O

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up despite poorly written instructions. Works pretty fast. The hot water is really HOT, so be careful !! It makes almost no noise and doesn't have to run all the time. The water bottle being inside instead of on top is a real plus, too. So far I'm loving it and would highly recommend it to anyone who lives rural like I do where the water doesn't taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sticker on top of unit takes 1 Star off... But, still highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to turn on or off the Cold and Hot settings. The dumb brainless sticker on the top of the dispenser is a big 1 Star off. I'm still trying to take off the residue from the sticker 😡. I also wish that the light would go on when you pressed the dispenser, instead you have to manually put it on. Those are minor gripes, it works great, and I still highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. MunsTer

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Easy
customer_reviews.text: This is our main water cooler in our office. We purchased it to replace a top load unit and this has opened our eyes to how much easier and safer a bottom load unit is! Wow! The buttons work perfectly and the temperature is always as expected (cold, "room temp," or hot). Allows employees to make soups, teas, etc. without the microwave. And the machine is easy to wipe down to disinfect. Good, compact unit that has tolerated our high volume use very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible actuator design
customer_reviews.text: The three water dispensers rely on a short, fairly thin piece of plastic inside of the machine in order to actuate the corresponding water valve. It's essentially a stem of plastic at the end of the lever. The plastic piece is fragile and will break after repeated use. After taking the top portion of the machine apart I found that its impossible to repair. I got a couple of years' use out of it, but I'll never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashy V

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase we have made on Amazon! We were previously using a Brita pitcher and that was a pain. This has made our lives so much easier to make sure we are drinking enough water. The kids love it. We love it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Jakubczyk

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service from Avalon! Nice Cooler!!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was not pleased - the room temperature and hot water buttons were VERY hard to push, yet the cold was perfect. I contacted customer service and they immediately sent me an email with a 1 minute video on how to fix it. Water cooler is now perfect after a quick fix that took a few minutes. The cooler is very nice looking and the 3 water temps are wonderful. The cold is really cold, hot perfect for tea, and room temp - well exactly that. Much easier and much nicer looking to have a bottom load cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: What My family likes is the ease of putting in a new bottle. Very simple! It’s a little noisy and sometimes rattles but we can live with it. What we don’t like is the fact that you can’t make the water temperature any colder. It’s cold but not really cold like units that have an adjustment. We just like the water colder but overall it works and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more hoisting the big bottles.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for a couple weeks (two bottles dispensed so far). I like the fact that my parents or my wife can change the bottle and they don't necessarily have to wait for me to lift it to the top like all our previous dispensers. The cooler is quiet and easy to operate. We like the little LED for use at night!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Gail Warner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to load
customer_reviews.text: This is the second water dispenser we have purchased. We bought this for our married adult children with 3 kids of their own. The older boys are able to refill their water on their own. This helps mom and dad. Easy to load, makes it easy for either parent to change the water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It works good, looks nice, but too loud
customer_reviews.text: Does what its supposed to, easy to use, seems durable and it looks nice. However, when you have the cold turned on, it’s way louder than our frig. Gets very annoying after awhile, you will feel the relief in your ears after you turned the cold off. It’s ok for home, but I don’t recommend for office used because of the noise.
customer_reviews.author: VNC

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Reduce your plastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love my water dispenser! I drink about a gallon a day. I bought this to help reduce my minimize the amount of plastic I’m using. Our recycling bin was always filled every week. Now I can go and refill my 5 gal bottle or swap it out for more water. I haven’t had any of the issues that other reviews shared about a plastic piece. It was delivered and within 20 minutes we were using it. Love love love
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great water cooler at a nice price.
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoy our water cooler. The bottom loading saves your back! We also feel good not using all those small water bottles. So many stores sell the 5gallon bottles, but we like Home Depot. We had one little problem, and I called their custom service and Angel G did everything to make it right. I love my cold water in the summer and a nice cup a tea or hot cocoa when it’s cold. My kids love cup a noodles instantly as well. Love this product. Allyson B
customer_reviews.author: Zach Buhler

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: the wand doesn't seem to reach the last inch of water in the 5 gallon bottles. I may be doing something wrong. but it's a nice machine for the price. and you can get that inch of water out by pouring it into a kool Aid pitcher for your kids or make some tea with it. don't ask me stupid questions about it please. Don't ask me if it fits in your house. I don't live in your house.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Ferguson

product_meta.title: Avalon A4BLWTRCLR water dispenser, 3 or 5 gallon bottle, Stainless Steel & Black
product_meta.description: Avalon 3 Temperature Bottom Loading Water Cooler with Child Safety Lock is made with an innovative stainless steel cabinet. It offers a choice of 3 water temperatures. The easy-to-use push button spouts make it so much more convenient to use. Simply press the temperature button of choice and allow the water to flow from the given spout. The machines highly efficient compressor makes the cold water crisp and ice cold at approximately 47° F without the need of adding ice cubes to your drink. The hot faucet is hot enough to cook one's tea or coffee or any other steaming hot beverage at approximately 180°F. Due to the extremely hot water, we’ve added a child safety lock on the hot water faucet. There is a built-in nightlight making the water spouts clearly visible in the dark. This water cooler is bottom loading with a cabinet to hold 3 or 5 gallon bottles. The water is pumped from the bottle through the machine. There is also an empty-bottle indicator that will light up when the bottle needs to be replaced. The water cooler is UL listed and complies with all standards of Energy Star. The unit dimensions are 41x12x13 inches. Removable drip tray.Cooling Capacity: 2.5 L/H
feature_bullets: Three temperatures: three temperature settings allow you to customize your drinking experience. This dispenser features a crisp Cold, cool, or piping hot Output
Innovative design: our sleek stylish stainless steel cabinet will make this water cooler fit right into your home kitchen or office.
Light the way: Our Built-In nightlight makes the water spouts clearly visible at night & has an empty-bottle indicator that lights up when the bottle needs to be replaced.Cooling Capacity: 2.5 L/H
Bottom loading: our water cooler is bottom loading to eliminate the strain of lifting, reduce spills and is suitable for 3-5 gallon water bottles (Bottle not included)
Child safe: this product is UL/Energy Star approved and features a child safety lock on the hot water spout so the entire family can use it worry free

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,798 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
